    dev-conc-resp Steps 01-05 of GeoToxMIE Sensitivity scripts

    Extract results from 2-parameter fit_hill outputs

    extract_hill_params.Rd

    Extract results from 2-parameter fit_hill outputs

    Usage

    extract_hill_params(fits)

    Arguments

    fits

    list of outputs from fit_hill(..., fixed_slope = TRUE)

    Value

    data frame

    Examples

    df <- data.frame(
  logc = -3:3,
  resp = 5 / (1 + 10^(1.2 * (0.4 - rep(-3:3, each = 3)))) + rnorm(21)
 )
fit <- fit_hill(df$logc, df$resp)
extract_hill_params(list(fit))
#>         tp     tp.sd  logAC50 logAC50.sd logc_min logc_max  resp_min resp_max
#> 1 2.883579 0.9715653 0.545588   1.020581       -3        3 -1.801941 5.920322
#>        AIC tp.sd.imputed logAC50.sd.imputed
#> 1 103.1887         FALSE              FALSE

df_list <- list(df, df)
fits <- lapply(df_list, function(df) {fit_hill(df$logc, df$resp)})
extract_hill_params(fits)
#>         tp     tp.sd  logAC50 logAC50.sd logc_min logc_max  resp_min resp_max
#> 1 2.883579 0.9715653 0.545588   1.020581       -3        3 -1.801941 5.920322
#> 2 2.883579 0.9715653 0.545588   1.020581       -3        3 -1.801941 5.920322
#>        AIC tp.sd.imputed logAC50.sd.imputed
#> 1 103.1887         FALSE              FALSE
#> 2 103.1887         FALSE              FALSE
